pageContext.claim: “[Democrats are] trying to tear down our institutions, disrespect our flag, demean our law enforcement, denigrate our history, and disparage our great country. And we're not going to let it happen.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats and Republicans certainly have their political differences, but both parties are trying to move the country forward in the way they think is best. Accusing Democrats of actively "trying to tear down our institutions" is a stretch.
